name: Polygon Cyber Gangster
description:
Night city in the ghetto
Welcome to the poly art game. Old-school crime underground of the world. Feel the rhythm of the retro synth music 80's. Capture supreme power in a fantasy low-poly world, with a pulsating neon light color and retro music 80's. Low-poly graphics and poly art in block city, robberies, shootout, carjacking! Listen to the retro wave from the radio station!

Antihero
Night city and a retro world on the verge of brutal war. The future of the retro city is in great danger because of the strife between powerful corporations and real gangster! Gangster steal auto's every day, rob shops, and disturb the peace of universe and night town.
You are an antihero. You play on the side of the evil gangsters and crazy bandits. Your super quest is to destroy corporations and justice from seizing power in the neon light world. Do everything to destroy bourgeois snouts and undermine the success of poly corporations.

Strong enemies
No one knows what corporate with neon power is capable of. They have hundreds of billions of credits, sci-fi poly technologies, and no feelings or pity. The merciless bourgeois will do everything to clear the city of heresy.

- Cyber Cops
- Special forces
- Agents of an evil corporation
- Military guys
- Armored robots
- Retro tanks
- Neon helicopters

Super quests!
Do not know what to do in the game? Carry out special assignments of bandits and city criminals. Destroy a detachment of agents, or make big boom on the streets of the city and hide from police on the helicopter - this is the usual task for a night city. Perform intricate quests, earn shekels, earn incredible kosher and neon power.

Earn money!
Killing an enemies soldier, police or special forces, gangster gain valuable experience, in addition - easy money. Having collected the necessary amount of money, real gangster hero can safely go to the nearest gun shop. Test out the latest weapons!

Choose a gun!
The weapon shop is the most visited point of the gangster city! On the shelves weapon cases, you will definitely find something tasty! The night city is famous for its underground business, which makes it paradise for explorers like the gangster.

Crime auto!
Does gangster want to move on foot? Who would doubt that! Hijack taxi, steal bus, theft tank or a helicopter? All this is possible in big city life of gangster!

Superpower!
We also took care of your free time. Buy special additions and improvements in the store and have fun! Do not let kosher corporations and bourgeoisie take over the world!
